title: Gaming laptops ($600 min - $1000 max)
body:
So im looking for a gaming laptop for roughly $600. $1000 max, tax included and calculated. Has to be canadian dollars. Preferably an ASUS, Dell, Acer or Lenovo. If not, then some laptop with the following specs I need: I want it to run reliably around 50 fps (no lower than 40), with minimal ping of around 25. Specs, I don't play many other games, so storage isn't an issue. Just want league to run smoothly and run at medium to max settings and graphics.

Thanks!
Mr. Dense
